home_text:
Welcome!
My name is Gioele Riva, and I'm a software engineer.
This website is an interactive resume that wants to show my abilities, interests and passions more easily.

If you want a printable version, you can find it HERE.

skills_text:
• Deep knowledge of Windows and Linux operating systems

  • Mastery of Microsoft Office tools

  • Graphic design capabilities (Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator)

  • Bases of Three-dimensional modeling (Autodesk Fusion 360, Sketchup) and 3D printing experience

  • Programming: Java (Spring framework, Android), C/C++ (Arduino), HTML, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, Oracle SQL, Microsoft SQL Server, Python bases and C#
portfolio_text: Source of inspiration for my work are personal needs or problems that I believe could be solved with skills that I acquired or that I am interested in acquiring. I'll collect in the Blog the small projects born from these needs, trying to document the processes and techniques used during their creation
